remarks.format:
## Remarks This enumeration describes whether a break is permitted for an inline object. This break is affected by the <xref:System.Windows.LineBreakCondition> of the inline object before it (if any). In the table below, the values across the top represent <xref:System.Windows.LineBreakCondition> values for one inline object while the values on the left represent values of another inline object. A value of "True" or "False" is indicated depending on whether a line break is permitted between the two inline objects.
